Title: HHVM (Hip Hop VM PHP) with Vagrant
Description:
How easy is testing HHVM with Vagrant!

Following the instructions of the Allan MacGregor's article, First steps on HHVM, available on http://coderoncode.com/2013/07/27/first-steps-on-hhvm.html.

And, of course, using Vagrant, available on http://www.vagrantup.com/

Enjoy

Como é fácil testar a HHVM com o Vagrant!

Seguindo as instruções do artigo do Allan MacGregor's, First steps on HHVM, disponível em http://coderoncode.com/2013/07/27/first-steps-on-hhvm.html.

E lógico que usando o Vagrant, disponível em http://www.vagrantup.com/.

Divirtam-se!
